title: ICT-Integrated Blended Learning-Based Mathematics Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematical concepts and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: ICT tool utilization competency enhancement program for secondary mathematics education.

learning_goals: Learners can design math concept visualization lessons using digital tools (e.g., GeoGebra, Desmos) in blended learning environments.
Learners can develop personalized math problem-solving strategies using mobile microlearning content.
Learners can construct formative assessment systems utilizing ICT-based evaluation tools (e.g., Kahoot!, Google Forms).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
